title: Plat 5 support main LFT
body:
Hi,

Im looking for a serious ranked 5's team that is in need of a support. Preferred team players of high gold and above is preferred. I have played in a fair few ranked 5's teams ranging from playing with bronze to diamond players. 

I can play all support but prefer {{champion:37}} , {{champion:40}} , {{champion:16}} , {{champion:1}}  and {{champion:89}} . If there is a specific champ you want me to be more proficient at playing as per my main sona thats easy done. I can play every night at present but prefer to play after 7pm. Next 2 weeks time availability may change due to uni. 

History:
Season 3: Silver 1, Gold 3 elo - Mid main
Season 4: Plat 3, diamond 4/5 elo - Support/Mid main
Season 5: Plat 5 - Support main

IGN: Mzsunday

replies.body: I have had to remove friends due to friends list cap i have added you as per your summoner name
